name: Jewel Glow In The Dark - New Tetroid Puzzle Game
name_original: Jewel Glow In The Dark - New Tetroid Puzzle Game
description:
This game is the glowing jewel which are classic and funny puzzle games.

How to play:

You'll need a glowing jewel box. all fields vertically or horizontally anywhere within the allotted time.

Drag and drop the jewel box on the same line, many will go. and you can continue indefinitely. until the stalemate is not the place to another.

Note: this game is suitable for people of all ages, kids or adults play good. you will find all the excitement, fun to play and then put down. download to play now!
